workshoptitle: Get started with Arm based Kubernetes clusters in Oracle Cloud Infrastructure

tutorials.title: Getting Started
tutorials.description: Prerequisites for LiveLabs (Oracle-owned tenancies). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Create an Arm based Kubernetes cluster
tutorials.description: The Introduction is always second. The title and contents menu title match for the Introduction.

tutorials.description: The Introduction is always second. The title and contents menu title match for the Introduction.
